A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed the fun ride this movie brings. It reminds me of the wonderment and imagination the first time I saw Star Wars in 1978. This is still the one movie I wait for in anticipation. It does not disappoint. I enjoyed the humor in the move as in the past. I would like to see more of R2 D2 and C3PO\, and more Chewy. Luke is still a complaining character and reminds me of the old character. Good job Disney! Not giving a 5 star due to not attaching to villian as I did with Darth Vader. I really want too\, but can't. Removing the helmet did not help.
